name: Ebb and Feel V2
description:
Play how you want, challenge yourself - just experience something unique.

Arrow keys to move. Shift key to use items you’ve picked up.

Hint: take a careful note of the stone of stability in the top left corner of your screen. Watch the world around you as it changes…

Good luck.
N.B. This game is in final stages of active development. There is a story to go with the adventure but the game is completely playable as it is now.

Known bugs which will be resolved very soon:
- WASD doesn't work properly - only arrows keys
- It is possible to crash into the side of some platforms - rare but it happens
- Landing after falling from breaking platforms sometimes forces the place to get stuck in "jumping" state until they die - also quite rare in normal gameplay.
